parameters.name: DefaultCertificate
parameters.description: The default certificate. If the domain name that you access cannot match the certificates of the broker, the default certificate is returned.

parameters.name: SniConfig
parameters.description: The Server Name Indication (SNI) configuration. This parameter is used to map domain names and certificates. Format: Domain name#Certificate ID#Password (if available);Domain name#Certificate ID#Password (if available).
